text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Target, not commitment/pledge/guarantee. The target was set to achieve high and push capacity. There’s no certainty for bringing new labs and what their capacity would be (staff, equipment). If we get to 70,80,90k, that’s a fucking amazing feat! We were at 1,000 in February.
